mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) values (seq_board_num.nextval, #{title}, #{content} , #{writer})

select seq_board_num.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from ( select /*+ index_desc(tbl_board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate from tbl_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from tbl_board where bno > 0
